description: This file defines a NoteEditor component for a personal notes management application. It provides UI and logic for creating or editing notes, handling input bindings, and invoking callbacks for save, delete, and cancel actions.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: Functional component for editing or creating notes, with props for note data, action handlers, and UI logic.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Invokes the onSave callback with current title and content.
